theExplorer:BigBrainForm.NAME: Big Brain Form
theExplorer:BigBrainForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, spend a Research Stack to gain 2 Dexterity.
theExplorer:BigBrainForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, spend a Research Stack to gain 2 Dexterity.

theExplorer:Birdcall.NAME: Birdcall
theExplorer:Birdcall.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 until end of turn.
theExplorer:Birdcall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all cards in your deck by 1 until end of turn.

theExplorer:BoxOfTricks.NAME: Box Of Tricks
theExplorer:BoxOfTricks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 1 less for each card type played this turn. (e.g. Attack, Skill)

theExplorer:BrambleWeed.NAME: Bramble Weed
theExplorer:BrambleWeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL For each enemy dealt unblocked damage, add a [#458B00]Plant[] to your hand.

theExplorer:BranchSnap.NAME: Branch Snap
theExplorer:BranchSnap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Vulnerable effects this card twice.

theExplorer:CalmingRest.NAME: Calming Rest
theExplorer:CalmingRest.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this by !M! for each time your theexplorer:Companion has used its ability this combat.

theExplorer:Camouflage.NAME: Camouflage
theExplorer:Camouflage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

theExplorer:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
theExplorer:Cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Debuffs from yourself. NL Gain !B! Block for each one removed. NL Exhaust.

theExplorer:Command.NAME: Command
theExplorer:Command.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your theexplorer:Companion's ability.

theExplorer:Contagion.NAME: Contagion
theExplorer:Contagion.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Poison to an enemy, apply it to all enemies instead.

theExplorer:CorruptedBlade.NAME: Corrupted Blade
theExplorer:CorruptedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals unblocked damage, apply !M! Poison.

theExplorer:Decoy.NAME: Decoy
theExplorer:Decoy.DESCRIPTION: If you have played a Defend this turn, prevent the next time you would take damage.

theExplorer:DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
theExplorer:DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 0-cost card is played twice.
theExplorer:DoubleUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 0-cost cards are played twice.

theExplorer:DuplicAnts.NAME: Duplic Ants
theExplorer:DuplicAnts.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 2 Duplic Ants to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theExplorer:EmergencySupplies.NAME: Emergency Supplies
theExplorer:EmergencySupplies.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you are below 20% health, heal for !M! and Exhaust.

theExplorer:Exhilarate.NAME: Exhilarate
theExplorer:Exhilarate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of each turn, lose 1 Strength.

theExplorer:FindingBalance.NAME: Finding Balance
theExplorer:FindingBalance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage Gain !B! Block. NL If your deck contains fewer Attacks, reduce damage by !M!. If your deck contains fewer Skills, reduce Block by !M!.

theExplorer:FlowerPot.NAME: Flower Pot
theExplorer:FlowerPot.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random [#458B00]Plant[] to your hand.
theExplorer:FlowerPot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Upgraded [#458B00]Plant[] to your hand.

theExplorer:FollowThrough.NAME: Follow Through
theExplorer:FollowThrough.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend Energy on a card this turn, draw a card.

theExplorer:ForestFire.NAME: Forest Fire
theExplorer:ForestFire.DESCRIPTION: For each card played this turn, deal !D! damage to all enemies and shuffle a Burn into your draw pile.

theExplorer:Fracture.NAME: Fracture
theExplorer:Fracture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy still has Block, deal !D! damage again.

theExplorer:FrenziedAttack.NAME: Frenzied Attack
theExplorer:FrenziedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card in your hand.

theExplorer:HatToss.NAME: Hat Toss
theExplorer:HatToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Then deal 2 less damage to another random enemy. Repeat until this would deal no damage.

theExplorer:Headshot.NAME: Headshot
theExplorer:Headshot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is being theexplorer:Researched, they lose 1 Strength.

theExplorer:HedgehogCompanion.NAME: Hedgehog Companion
theExplorer:HedgehogCompanion.DESCRIPTION: Replace your theexplorer:Companion with theexplorer:Hedgehog. NL Remove this card from your deck.

theExplorer:Highlander.NAME: Highlander
theExplorer:Highlander.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. theexplorer:Highlander. NL Deal X damage and gain X Block. NL (X is the number of cards in your deck)
theExplorer:Highlander.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. theexplorer:Highlander. NL Deal X damage and gain X Block. NL (X is the number of cards in your deck)

theExplorer:ImprovisedDefenses.NAME: Improvised Defenses
theExplorer:ImprovisedDefenses.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 0 cost card, gain !M! Block.

theExplorer:Initiative.NAME: Initiative
theExplorer:Initiative.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If this is the first card played this turn, draw a card.

theExplorer:Insight.NAME: Insight
theExplorer:Insight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a copy of the next card you play this turn to your hand. (Cannot copy another Insight)

theExplorer:Inspect.DESCRIPTION: Start theexplorer:Researching an enemy. NL Exhaust.
theExplorer:Inspect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Start theexplorer:Researching an enemy. NL Exhaust.

theExplorer:InvigoratingBrew.NAME: Invigorating Brew
theExplorer:InvigoratingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. theexplorer:Concoct. NL [#DC1515]Attack[]: Gain 1 [E]. NL [#22B21B]Skill[]: Gain 2 Dexterity until end of turn. NL [#2FD0E0]Power[]: Remove Stealth from all enemies.

theExplorer:IvyTrap.NAME: Ivy Trap
theExplorer:IvyTrap.DESCRIPTION: The next time you receive unblocked attack damage, apply !M! Poison to the attacker.
theExplorer:IvyTrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next time you receive attack damage, apply !M! Poison to the attacker.

theExplorer:Leech.NAME: Leech
theExplorer:Leech.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, heal !M!. NL Exhaust.

theExplorer:LuckyStrike.NAME: Lucky Strike
theExplorer:LuckyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL If you draw an Attack, deal !D! damage again.
theExplorer:LuckyStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 2 cards. NL If you draw an Attack, deal !D! damage again.

theExplorer:MedleyBrew.NAME: Medley Brew
theExplorer:MedleyBrew.DESCRIPTION: theexplorer:Concoct X times. Exhaust. NL [#DC1515]Attack[]: Add a random Attack to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL [#22B21B]Skill[]: Add a random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL [#2FD0E0]Power[]: Add a random Power to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
theExplorer:MedleyBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theexplorer:Concoct X+1 times. Exhaust. NL [#DC1515]Attack[]: Add a random Attack to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL [#22B21B]Skill[]: Add a random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL [#2FD0E0]Power[]: Add a random Power to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

theExplorer:MoltenBrew.NAME: Molten Brew
theExplorer:MoltenBrew.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. theexplorer:Concoct. NL [#DC1515]Attack[]: Deal !D! damage to all enemies instead. NL [#22B21B]Skill[]: Draw a card. NL [#2FD0E0]Power[]: Remove all Block from the enemy.

theExplorer:MortalTorrent.NAME: Mortal Torrent

theExplorer:MortalTorrent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theexplorer:Unique. NL At the end of your turn, if your hand is full, play every card in your hand.

theExplorer:NutShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Add 2 random [#458B00]Plants[] to your hand.

theExplorer:Outbreak.NAME: Outbreak

theExplorer:Outbreak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to all enemies. NL Increase this by 2 each time you apply Poison to an enemy.

theExplorer:Overload.NAME: Overload
theExplorer:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply 2 Frail to yourself.

theExplorer:OwlCompanion.NAME: Owl Companion
theExplorer:OwlCompanion.DESCRIPTION: Replace your theexplorer:Companion with theexplorer:Owl. NL Remove this card from your deck.

theExplorer:Photosynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a [#458B00]Plant[], Upgrade it twice.

theExplorer:PitTrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next time you receive attack damage, Stun the attacker for 1 turn.

theExplorer:QuestFontOfLife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theexplorer:Unique. Innate. NL Quest: Play 5 cards that cost 2 or more. NL Reward: Gain 2 theexplorer:Energised.

theExplorer:QuestRepairTower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theexplorer:Unique. Innate. NL Quest: Gain 100 Block. NL Reward: Convert all unused Block into damage to a random enemy.
